subject: New York City Marathon
Hurricane Sandy (2012)
lead_paragraph: Those registered for the 2012 New York City Marathon, canceled after Hurricane Sandy, were offered a full refund or entry into a race from 2013 to 2015 at this year’s rates.
snippet: Those registered for the 2012 New York City Marathon, canceled after Hurricane Sandy, were offered a full refund or entry into a race from 2013 to 2015 at this year’s rates.
